channel.title: Server hopelessness
channel.description: I've followed the guides, I've followed the alternates, I've called tech support... I just can't seem to get my no-ip. to connect my server! I've tried utorrent, and it didn't work... I tried portforwarding, and it didnt work :/. Isn't there any idiot-proof way of getting this client online.... I've looked up so many different things. I'm actually pretty frustrated, as I'm trying to navigate an alien language. Well... at least alien to me. And it's a damn shame too :P I was going make a good private server for my cc... any last resorts? Solutions? Methods? Suggestions? This is so frustrating. Especially if I don't know what the hell I'm doing. Will someone PLEASE help. Thanks!! :o

Well. Firstly Cyber, I’ll pretend to comprehend what you said. Secondly, What the hell did you just…? what is this

item.title: Server hopelessness
item.dc:creator: @Valcorex Valcorex
item.description:
@Valcorex wrote:

this is what is happening to me except my clients won’t connect even through my ip address alone…

Read full topic

item.title: Server hopelessness
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Get others to try and connect to the server via your ip address. If that fails, then of course your no-ip will fail. If it works, then make sure no-ip is always open and you select your host in preferences.

Read full topic
